# Example


Create a hierarchical signature data frame from a tree and and signature database

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(here)
library(tibble)
library(readr)
library(cellsig)



test_random_intercept |>
    
    #mutate(multiplier = exp(exposure_rate)) |> 
    cellsig_multilevel_varing_intercept(
      .sample, 
      .feature,
      count, 
      cell_type,
      multiplier, 
      database, 
      pass_fit = TRUE
    )
```
